ygData.subject: Consolidation of new song ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday I recommended that we come up with a list of song ideas to send to Verant to give them some help for our missing songs below 50th level and for the
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday I recommended that we come up with a list of song ideas to send to
Verant to give them some help for our missing songs below 50th level and for
the 51-75th level songs that will be part of the expansion. A few of you
have come up with some pretty good ideas so far.

I will volunteer to consolidate all of the suggestions and prepare it for
submission to Verant. However, I am going on vacation tomorrow through 5
December. Because I will be gone so long, I am going to temporarily stop my
subscription to this list so I can avoid having my Inbox flooded with
messages. So, unless someone else wants to volunteer to consolidate the
suggestions, I request that, in addition to posting your suggestion to this
list, you also send me a direct email. My home email address is:
bamadude@...

This may be a complete waste of time if Verant completely ignores us but I
think its worth a shot. If you send in a song idea, I suggest using your
bards name as part of the song title. If Verant uses your song idea, you
might get lucky and have your bard's name included as part of the game.

Galtin of E'ci
